pageContext.claim: “....Will Robert Mueller’s big time conflicts of interest be listed at the top of his Republicans only Report. Will Andrew Weissman’s horrible and vicious prosecutorial past be listed in the Report. He wrongly destroyed people’s lives, took down great companies, only to be........ .....overturned, 9-0, in the United States Supreme Court. Doing same thing to people now.”
pageContext.analysis: Weissman, an attorney on Mueller's team, prosecuted Arthur Andersen for shredding Enron accounting documents while the company was collapsing. The Supreme Court overturned Andersen's conviction 9-0 because the trial judge failed to give the jury proper instructions. It's absurd to claim Weissman "destroyed people's lives, took down great companies." Enron is the poster child for fraudulent accounting practices in corporate America.
